data.Title: Yelp Sues Google for Anticompetitive Behavior
data.Description: Yelp has filed an antitrust lawsuit against Google, alleging anticompetitive behavior and harm to consumer choice.

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Impacts Websites
data.Description: Google's August 2024 core update has significantly impacted website rankings, with analysis showing that 81 out of 390+ heavily affected sites have recovered.

data.Title: Google Discover Penalizes Sites for Misleading Content
data.Description: Google has started penalizing websites with misleading content in Google Discover, enforcing policies to maintain content quality.

data.Title: Google Local Service Ads Review Links to Expire
data.Description: Google Local Service Ads review links will now expire, and businesses are advised to use Google Business Profile review links instead.

data.Title: Looker Studio Loses Access to Google Ads Auction Insights Data
data.Description: Looker Studio users have reported losing access to Google Ads Auction Insights data, impacting their ability to analyze ad performance.

data.Title: Google Ads Introduces "Internal Tools" Button
data.Description: Google Ads has introduced a new "Internal tools" button, the purpose of which is currently unclear.

data.Title: Google Ads Merchant Center Gets AI Tools and New Reporting Features
data.Description: Google Ads Merchant Center introduces new AI-powered tools, summaries, and reporting features to enhance campaign management and analysis.

data.Title: Google Gemini AI Gets "Custom Gems" for Personalized AI Experts
data.Description: Google's Gemini AI now includes "Custom Gems," a feature allowing users to create personalized AI experts tailored to specific topics.

data.Title: Baidu Restricts Google and Bing from Scraping Content for AI Training
data.Description: Baidu has updated its Baike service to prevent Google and Bing from scraping its content for AI training purposes, raising concerns about data access and competition.

data.Title: YouTube Adds QR Codes for Channel Sharing
data.Description: YouTube now allows users to easily share channels using QR codes, providing a convenient way to promote and grow their audience.
